title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 22 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 22 2022
description:
Governor Ron DeSantis vs. Disney in the culture war. Disney: This is the left jumping the gender shark moment. Clay says: "DeSantis has fired back. But all this really does is put Disney back on an even playing field in the state of Florida. It eliminates the special treatment." The Evanston/Skokie School District has adopted a radical gender curriculum that encourages PK-3 students to celebrate the transgender flag, break the "gender binary" established by white "colonizers," and experiment with neo-pronouns such as "ze," "zir," and "tree." Clay and Buck enjoy Tucker Carlson basking in the schadenfreude of CNN+ hilarious 21-day collapse. Philadelphia's new mask mandate lasts four days, L.A. reinstitutes transit mask mandate. Biden's W.H. covid advisor Ashish Jha says "a major goal" of the Biden administration "is to make sure that the CDC has the authority" to unilaterally implement mask mandates in the future.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
